TEXT.S:
Estoniau Estoniasa i labu nu Oco, itiza i 59 00 N, 26 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 45,228 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 42,388 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 2,840 km2, hamin nu tademawan sa 1,258,545. kakalukan umah sa 22.20%, kilakilangan umah sa 52.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 25.70%
Ay-sa-ni-ya a masakaputay kapulung a kanatal (Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamu: Eesti Vabariik), hamin nu pulung Ay-sa-ni-ya (Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamu: Eesti, ['e:sʲti]), u sakacacay nu Pu-lula bayu nu kanatal, u satabakiay a tusunu cen-sei Ta-lin. Ay-sa-ni-ya i O-cul nu sawali saamisan. kini lala' nu kanatal namakayda i ta-luatu i teban nu Pu-lula bayu 2222 a subal nu masakaput mapulung, paysatip nu Pu-lula bayu, saamisan u Hung-lan, i sawali mitepal tu Cu-te-hu, nu timulan atu sawalian maliwasak mahida u La-tul-wei-yaatu Er-lul-siu misululay pabeli, u ahebal nu lala' 45,227 pin-haw-kung-li, u demiad nu ta-lutanengay ku akuti' susuemedan. kina kanatal nu itiniay tu a tademaw u binacadan Ay-sa-ni-ya u nu Pu-lulu Hung-lanaya tademaw. kina kanatal ayda satu nu Pai-o-li-se-huy, O-cul malcabayay mapulung, O-yuan kenis, Sen-ken kenis, saamisan ta-si-yang nikapulungan a kaput, atu nu kalisiw malpadan atu sapalahed a masakapud a tademaw nu kanatal, ya nisakalis u sayadahay ku kalisiw i kitaki.[1] (u kamu nu Hulam: :Eesti Vabariik:Eesti['e:sʲti] 222245,227)
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Tallinn.
kakininan nu kanatal demiadkakining nu kanatal demiad sa 24 bulad 2 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung ) ayza sa ci Alar Karis, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihca 11 bulad 10 demiad. u cunli nu Estoniaayza sa ci Kaja Kallas, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 1 bulad 26 demiad.
laylay-1227- Ay-sa-ni-yaa kakitidaan i ayaw nu laylay a tademaw hawsa nu Hung-lan-u-ke-er a tademaw(-). na i 1227 a mihcaan, Ay-sa-ni-yaalaw malu nu Tan-mayatu nu ri-er-mana tademawayay nu Li-wu-ni-yau mipadangay miadin tu tademawtemeceng, namahini sisa cumuden nu ciwlu. namakayni satu sa, Ay-sa-ni-yakina pinaay tu makuwan nu Bei-o. nikahida idaw ku Tan-may, Nul-wiy, Rye-tiyana kanatal, Pu-lan-li-taw-wan malkaputay.[2] 181991 18 a se-cimaalaw nu Er-lul-si-sanu hungtiay a kanatal u Er-kul cacayay a bulad malpapacaw satu nadikudan sakunida sa tu, i sakatusa aca malpacawpacaw i kitakit tu saayayway alaen aca nu Su-lian. 1991 a mihcaan, Ay-sa-ni-yasisa kinacacay aca malukunida.[3] Eestiesti98"aestii""Eesti"19 nu ayda a ngangan nu Ay-sa-ni-yaa kanatal (Eesti) u tatangahan namakayni i Ku-si-kan-ti-na-wei-yaa tademaw, ya i tidaay mueneng i Tung-si-kan-ti-na-wei-yaa binacadan amin u esti han nu heni. i kun-yun98 a mihcaan, Ta-si-tuoi nipisulit nida "Ri-er-man-ni-ya-zhi" sakamu sa tya cacay u caay kalecad a kamu "aestii" patinaku tu tya Ay-sa-ni-ya. Ay-sa-ni-yaa tademaw u udip tu ku micukaymasay tu "Eesti" palungangan han tu kina kanatal, kina ngangan kiayyawan hen i 19 se-ci.[4]
nipicudad13141575·16321919 Ay-sa-ni-yau nipicudad nu heni makilim tu i 13 atu 14 a se-ci, u nipatideng sayaway a siw-taw-yunatu nu kiwkay a cacudadan. u saayaway a cudad nu kamu Ay-sa-ni-yasapasubana' a cudad napatahkal i 1575 a mihcaan. u nu kasumamadan a dayhaksa i Ta-er-tu a dayhaku, u Ri-tiyana hungti ci Ku-si-ta-hu-er-se A-taw-hu i 1632 a mihcaan a nipatiden. i 1919 a mihcaan, u Ay-sa-ni-yaa kamu sayaway i tayhaku pasubana tu sapicudad.[5] :589 ayda u picudad nu Ay-sa-ni-yau sakantanay, u kanamuhan a kawaw atu milinziay. ya sapasubana' tu nipicudad palasepaden: u talaayaway a nipasubana', sakatanitik a picudad, tu nu tanengay a picudad atu talakaway a nipicudad. misaahebal a patideng tu cacudatan nu wang-luatu nisanga' tu sapasubana' a kawaw. u Ay-sa-ni-yaa sapasubana' sikaidaw ku kul-li, se-li, kung-li, atu se-lipakumuday a kawaw. nu aydaya a Ay-sa-ni-yaidaw tu ku lima a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku siwa nu cacudadan.[6]
Cung-huw-min-kulatu Ay-sa-ni-ya1937-19401991 u Cung-huw-min-kulatu Ay-sa-ni-yau nu Cung-huw-min-kulatu Ay-sa-ni-yamasakaputay kapulungan a kanatal nu masacabaay a kanatal. kinatusaay a kanatal i 1937-1940 a mihca idaw ku talakaway nu mikawaway i hekal, sikasan u Su-liyenmialaw tu Ay-sa-ni-yakyu mapulu. namakayni i 1991 a mihca makay i Su-liyenmahcacay hawsa, ayda nai' tu ku i tusumapapadeng tu ta-si-kuwan-sin-ciu midayliay a pikawawan. sakay i Ay-sa-ni-yasakaykawaw u Latviai Taypak u midayliay nipadengan tu pikawawan.[7]
cen-cimasacabay a kapud19371221 1937 a mihca sabaw tusa a bulad tusaay idaw kucacay a demiad, Ay-sa-ni-yaatu Cung-huw-min-kulpatideng tu pikawawan nu masacabayay a kapud.[8] 194086 1940 a mihca waluay a bulad idaw ku enenmay a demiad zayhan u Su-lianmidebung tu Ay-sa-ni-yaa mapulu'.[9] 1991118 1991 a mihca sabaw cacay a bulad waluay ku demiad, Cung-huw-min-kulu mikawaway tu sakatusa a sakakaay ci Cang-Siyaw-Yantayni mididaw a mipalita tu Ay-sa-ni-ya, atu ya pakasikalisiway a nikalcabay nu sakakaay ci Pi-Er-Fumasasulit tu sakay tini malaliyung tu sakasikalisiw a midayhiway sulit tu kalisiw tu mapapadan sakacaay kapawan.[10] 199568 1995 a mihca enemay a bulad, u Cung-huw-min-kulu mababaliay a pu-cang mikelid tu masakaputay tayda i Rye-semilabu tu Mun-tay-na-lun-tan, nikahida masuadih tu Ay-sa-ni-yaa cung-tung ci Mei-Li, sikahini kina mahtusaay u malaliyun tu tuud hina papaliw. waluay a bulad, Ay-sa-ni-yasayaway a cung-tung ci La-Er u mitayliay tu kanatal a mipalitay a kiingtayni i Taywan mididaw.[11]
sacumud a cudad690 O-cul Se-ken kenispabeli tu sisulitay nu idaw tu a mibungsiwaytu Cung-huw-min-kula hu-caw nu Cung-huw-min-kul-kun-min taneng i Se-ken kenis caay pacudad tu sacumud a tayni, pahanhan tu demiad atu Se-ken kenis palamel a misausi, payenem a bulad nu demiadan hamin nu sausi tanen pahanhan tu siwaay a bataan nu demiad.[12]
manamec""20175 kina tusaay a kanatal panutek makakutay tu kawaw nu tusu"Tay-ay masasuayay masakamukamu tu sakay idaw ku kalisiw", katukuh i 2017 a mihca kina lima tu mikawaw.[13]
nisakalisiw a kawaw2015418"2015"36 2015 a mihca sepaday a bulad sabaw walu a demiad, cin-ci-pu kul-ci-maw-yi papipadan tu Cung-huw-min-kultu hekalay a maw-yi-fa-can-siy-huy"way-maw-siy-huy" mikawaway tu "2015 a mihca u sin-Pei-O u micuduhat a milacuk tu kawaw sa "atu tulu a bataan idaw ku enem nu pikawawan tayda i Er-lul-si-sen-pi-te-paw, Hung-lan, Ay-sa-ni-ya, Ri-tiyanatu Po-lankina kanatalan milihida tu sapatiyan, kina mapulungay kanca u Taywanay tu ku nanu tayda i Pai-oa kenis u satabakiay a misaahebal tu dadanan nu sapacakaymaba.[14] 201711"2017" 2017 a mihca sabaw cacay a bulad, kung-ye-ci-suu tatangahan nu mikinkiway ci Li-Si-Kuwan mikelid tu manamecay i "2017 a mihca u O-cul idaw ku nisabaluhay nikinkiwan a patahekal papiadih tu tayniay atu mikilim tu mamilabu tina kawawan" tayda i Ay-sa-ni-yamillihida tu sapacakay.[15] 201989101748,2494,39918.791%1,4125,24029.366%6,8369,15916.199%;20188610074 2019 a mihca, Ay-sa-ni-yanu Cung-huw-min-kulsakay walu a bataan idaw ku siwa tabakiay nu malkumud a mababalin, u sakay cacay a lasubu idaw ku cacay u satabakiay nu micumutay a nikalcabay tu tuud, u sakay 74 u tabakiay a patahekal nu nikalcabay. ya tuud nipatahkal katukuh i Ay-sa-ni-yaaya kalisiw idaw ku 8,249 a mang 4,399 nu kalisiw, paymihcaan maselep tu 29,366 a pasintu. mababalin malakuwid tu "nisakalisiwan" 6,836 a mang 9,159 kalisiw nu paymihcaan maselep tu 16,199 pasintu; 2018 a mihca u Ay-sa-ni-yau Cung-huw-min-kulsaka walu a bataan idaw ku enem tabakiay amababaliay a nikacabayan, sakacacay a lasubu u tabakiay a pacumud tu tuud a masacabaay, u saka pitu idaw ku satabakiay a patahkal tu tuud nu malcabayay.[16]
